attributes.action: Stop Turkish Aggression Towards Northern Iraq
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Turkish Government is gearing up for military operations in Northern Iraq. Please sign this petition if you would like to urge Mr Brown to do more to condemn and persuade the Turkish Government to find a diplomatic solution to the current problem.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
